languages.text: "Испытание? Это доброе дело. Не только, чтобы себя закалить, но и чтобы понять, что за племя у кровавой весталки". {n}Ульфар задумчиво гладит бороду, глядя на культистку смерти.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Испытание? Это доброе дело. Не только, чтобы себя закалить, но и чтобы понять, что за племя у кровавой весталки". {n}Ульфар задумчиво гладит бороду, глядя на культистку смерти.{/n}

languages.text: "A test? Good. Not only will it make you stronger, Aett-Vater, it will let you understand what sort of tribe this blood scryer belongs to." {n}Ulfar strokes his beard as he regards the death cultist before you.{/n}

"A test? Good. Not only will it make you stronger, Aett-Vater, it will let you understand what sort of tribe this blood scryer belongs to." {n}Ulfar strokes his beard as he regards the death cultist before you.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Una prueba? Bien. No solo le hará más fuerte, Aett-Vater, sino que también le permitirá comprender a qué clase de tribu pertenece ese vidente de sangre». {n}Ulfar se acaricia la barba mientras observa al cultista de la muerte ante ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A test? Good. Not only will it make you stronger, Aett-Vater, it will let you understand what sort of tribe this blood scryer belongs to." {n}Ulfar strokes his beard as he regards the death cultist before you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Una prueba? Bien. No solo le hará más fuerte, Aett-Vater, sino que también le permitirá comprender a qué clase de tribu pertenece ese vidente de sangre». {n}Ulfar se acaricia la barba mientras observa al cultista de la muerte ante ti.{/n}

languages.text: 「テスト？よろしい。お前を強くするだけでなく、アエット＝ヴァテル、この血の叫び声の主がどんな種族か理解できるだろう」{n}ウルファーは目の前の死のカルト信者を見ながら髭を撫でた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A test? Good. Not only will it make you stronger, Aett-Vater, it will let you understand what sort of tribe this blood scryer belongs to." {n}Ulfar strokes his beard as he regards the death cultist before you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「テスト？よろしい。お前を強くするだけでなく、アエット＝ヴァテル、この血の叫び声の主がどんな種族か理解できるだろう」{n}ウルファーは目の前の死のカルト信者を見ながら髭を撫でた。{/n}

languages.text: “试炼？很好。这场试炼不仅会让你变得更加强大，还会让你看清这位鲜血占卜师所在的部落是什么样子的，狼领。”{n}乌尔法抚摸着胡须，看着你面前的拜死教教徒。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A test? Good. Not only will it make you stronger, Aett-Vater, it will let you understand what sort of tribe this blood scryer belongs to." {n}Ulfar strokes his beard as he regards the death cultist before you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “试炼？很好。这场试炼不仅会让你变得更加强大，还会让你看清这位鲜血占卜师所在的部落是什么样子的，狼领。”{n}乌尔法抚摸着胡须，看着你面前的拜死教教徒。{/n}

languages.text: "Eine Prüfung? Gut. Sie wird Euch nicht nur stärker machen, Aett-Vater, sondern Euch zeigen, welchem Stamm dieser Blutwahrsager angehört." {n}Ulfar streicht sich über seinen Bart und deutet auf den toten Kultisten vor dir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A test? Good. Not only will it make you stronger, Aett-Vater, it will let you understand what sort of tribe this blood scryer belongs to." {n}Ulfar strokes his beard as he regards the death cultist before you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eine Prüfung? Gut. Sie wird Euch nicht nur stärker machen, Aett-Vater, sondern Euch zeigen, welchem Stamm dieser Blutwahrsager angehört." {n}Ulfar streicht sich über seinen Bart und deutet auf den toten Kultisten vor dir.{/n}

languages.text: « Une mise à l'épreuve ? Bien. Non seulement vous en ressortirez plus {mf|fort|forte}, aett-vater, mais cela vous permettra également de comprendre à quel genre de tribu cette augure de sang appartient. » {n}Ulfar se caresse la barbe tout en observant la cultiste de sang qui se tient devant vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A test? Good. Not only will it make you stronger, Aett-Vater, it will let you understand what sort of tribe this blood scryer belongs to." {n}Ulfar strokes his beard as he regards the death cultist before you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Une mise à l'épreuve ? Bien. Non seulement vous en ressortirez plus {mf|fort|forte}, aett-vater, mais cela vous permettra également de comprendre à quel genre de tribu cette augure de sang appartient. » {n}Ulfar se caresse la barbe tout en observant la cultiste de sang qui se tient devant vous.{/n}

languages.text: "İmtihan mı? Güzel. İmtihan, seni daha güçlü kılmakla kalmaz Aett-Vater. Aynı zamanda kan kâhininin ne tür bir kabileye ait olduğunu anlamanı da sağlar." {n}Ulfar, önünde duran ölüm tarikatçısına bakarken sakalını sıvazlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A test? Good. Not only will it make you stronger, Aett-Vater, it will let you understand what sort of tribe this blood scryer belongs to." {n}Ulfar strokes his beard as he regards the death cultist before you.{/n}
